NAME AS salesmanLeaderName, IFNULL(l.salesman_count, 0) AS salesmanCount, u.customer_info_count AS customerCount FROM salesman_info g LEFT JOIN ( SELECT k.belong, COUNT(1) AS salesman_count FROM salesman_info k WHERE deleted = 0 GROUP BY belong ) AS l ON g.id = l.belong LEFT JOIN ( SELECT e.id, count(f.customer_info_id) AS customer_info_count FROM ( SELECT a.id, a.`name`, b.salesmanid, b.customer_info_id FROM salesman_info a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT salesmanid, id AS customer_info_id FROM customer_info WHERE deleted = 0 ) AS b ON b.salesmanid = a.id WHERE identity = 1 ) e LEFT JOIN ( SELECT c.id, c.belong, c.`name`, d.salesmanid, d.customer_info_id FROM salesman_info c RIGHT JOIN ( SELECT salesmanid, id AS customer_info_id FROM customer_info WHERE deleted = 0 ) AS d ON d.salesmanid = c.id WHERE identity = 0 ) f ON e.id = f.belong GROUP BY e.id ) u ON g.id = u.id WHERE g.identity = 1 AND g.deleted = 0
